languages.text: Параметр, обозначающий, насколько трудно попасть в цель в космическом бою. При расчете атаки значение уклонения вычитается из шанса попадания.

A parameter that shows how difficult it is to hit a target in space combat. When calculating the probability of a successful hit, the target's evasion chance is deducted from the attacker's hit chance.
languages.original_text: Параметр, обозначающий, насколько трудно попасть в цель в космическом бою. При расчете атаки значение уклонения вычитается из шанса попадания.

traits.locale_text: A parameter that shows how difficult it is to hit a target. When calculating the probability of a successful hit, the target's evasion chance is deducted from the attacker's hit chance.
A parameter that shows how difficult it is to hit a target. When calculating the probability of a successful hit, the target's evasion chance is deducted from the attacker's hit chance.
A parameter that shows how difficult it is to hit a target. When calculating the probability of a successful hit, the target's evasion chance is deducted from the attacker's hit chance.

A parameter that shows how difficult it is to hit a target in space combat. When calculating the probability of a successful hit, the target's evasion chance is deducted from the attacker's hit chance.

A parameter that shows how difficult it is to hit a target in space combat. When calculating the probability of a successful hit, the target's evasion chance is deducted from the attacker's hit chance.

languages.text: Ein Parameter, der zeigt, wie schwierig es ist, ein Ziel im Weltraumkampf zu treffen. Bei der Berechnung der Wahrscheinlichkeit eines erfolgreichen Treffers wird die Ausweichen-Chance des Ziels von der Trefferchance des Angreifers abgezogen.
languages.original_text: A parameter that shows how difficult it is to hit a target in space combat. When calculating the probability of a successful hit, the target's evasion chance is deducted from the attacker's hit chance.

traits.locale_text: Ein Parameter, der zeigt, wie schwierig es ist, ein Ziel zu {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}treffen{/g}. Bei der Trefferwahrscheinlichkeitsberechnung eines Treffers wird die {g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}Ausweichen-Chance{/g} des Ziels von der {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}Trefferchance{/g} des Angreifers abgezogen.

languages.text: Paramètre illustrant la difficulté à toucher une cible lors d'un combat spatial. Lors du calcul de la probabilité de réussite, les chances d'évitement de la cible sont déduites des chances de toucher l'attaquant.
languages.original_text: A parameter that shows how difficult it is to hit a target in space combat. When calculating the probability of a successful hit, the target's evasion chance is deducted from the attacker's hit chance.

traits.locale_text: Paramètre illustrant la difficulté à {g|Encyclopedia:Hit}toucher{/g} une cible. Lors du calcul de la probabilité de réussite, les chances d'{g|Encyclopedia:EvasionSpace}évasion{/g} de la cible sont déduites des {g|Encyclopedia:HitChance}chances d'infliger un coup{/g} de l'attaquant.

languages.text: 这个属性代表太空战斗中命中目标的难度。在计算成功命中的几率时，会使用攻击者的命中率减掉目标的闪避几率，从而计算最终命中率。
languages.original_text: A parameter that shows how difficult it is to hit a target in space combat. When calculating the probability of a successful hit, the target's evasion chance is deducted from the attacker's hit chance.

traits.locale_text: 这个属性代表太空战斗中命中目标的难度。在计算成功命中的几率时，会使用攻击者的命中率减掉目标的闪避几率，从而计算最终命中率。

languages.original_text: A parameter that shows how difficult it is to hit a target. When calculating the probability of a successful hit, the target's evasion chance is deducted from the attacker's hit chance.

languages.text: Un parámetro que indica lo difícil que es impactar a un objetivo durante el combate espacial. Al realizar el cálculo, la probabilidad de esquiva del objetivo se resta a la probabilidad de impacto del atacante.
languages.original_text: A parameter that shows how difficult it is to hit a target in space combat. When calculating the probability of a successful hit, the target's evasion chance is deducted from the attacker's hit chance.

traits.locale_text: Un parámetro que indica lo difícil que es impactar a un objetivo durante el combate espacial. Al realizar el cálculo, la probabilidad de esquiva del objetivo se resta a la probabilidad de impacto del atacante.

languages.text: ターゲットに命中させるのがどの程度難しいのかを示すパラメータ。命中が成功する確率を計算する際、ターゲットの回避率がアタッカーの命中率から引かれる。
languages.original_text: A parameter that shows how difficult it is to hit a target in space combat. When calculating the probability of a successful hit, the target's evasion chance is deducted from the attacker's hit chance.

traits.locale_text: ターゲットに命中させるのがどの程度難しいのかを示すパラメータ。命中が成功する確率を計算する際、ターゲットの回避率がアタッカーの命中率から引かれる。

languages.text: Uzay çatışmasında hedefe vurabilme zorluğunu gösteren bir parametre. Başarılı bir vuruş olasılığı hesaplanırken, hedefin sıyrılma olasılığı saldırganın vuruş olasılığından çıkarılır.
languages.original_text: A parameter that shows how difficult it is to hit a target in space combat. When calculating the probability of a successful hit, the target's evasion chance is deducted from the attacker's hit chance.
